name: Mango Salsa
description: This quick, chunky salsa, which Marian Burros brought to The Times in 1990, is an easy addition to weeknight burritos, tacos and enchiladas. A squeeze of lime brightens the mango’s flavors, and a bit of jalapeño adds spice. Simply combine all the ingredients, and serve alongside your main for an elevated dinner.
recipeIngredient: 1 large ripe mango, peeled and flesh cubed

recipeInstructions.text: Combine the ingredients and use as above.
